alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:50PM CDT until March 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winnsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crowville around 405 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
